summary: Lowest possible playable settings. Only for those who have on-board graphics or need 100+ FPS. Usable for helping to find bottlenecks or optimal settings even if you do have a graphics card.
descriptionHtml:
Edit: Major change: 

[Trees]
bRenderSkinnedTrees=1
uiMaxSkinnedTreesToRender=10

Makes a HUGE difference without much performance loss.

See http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=anId6NaO6is.

Thanks to AkemiHomura93, who made the above video and settings. He uses a netbook (no video card) in the above video.

I am putting this up because I got better performance than low, and I got no stuttering. 

If you have a computer that even has a video card, you should increase all of the settings. These settings are for when you don\'t care about graphics at all or are trying to figure out which graphics settings are having the biggest effect on your FPS.

If you have a good computer:
For skyrim.ini, changing uExterior Cell Buffer can help a lot with stuttering.
[General]
uExterior Cell Buffer=288


Skyrimprefs.ini

[Display]
iTexMipMapSkip=1
bFXAAEnabled=0
fMeshLODLevel2FadeDist=3072.0000
fMeshLODLevel1FadeDist=4096.0000
fSpecularLODStartFade=200.0000
fLightLODStartFade=300.0000
fTreesMidLODSwitchDist=0.0000
iShadowMapResolution=128
fShadowBiasScale=0.0000
iShadowMaskQuarter=0
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=0
fShadowDistance=0.0000
iMaxDecalsPerFrame=0
iMaxSkinDecalsPerFrame=0
iAdapter=0
iSize W=1280
iSize H=720
iMultiSample=1
iMaxAnisotropy=4
iPresentInterval=0
bFull Screen=1
sD3DDevice=\"ENB\"
fInteriorShadowDistance=0.0000
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
fGamma=0.9200
iShadowFilter=0
fDecalLOD2=800.0000
fDecalLOD1=500.0000
fShadowLODStartFade=0.0000
iTexMipMapMinimum=0
bTransparencyMultisampling=0
iWaterMultiSamples=0
iShadowMode=0
bTreesReceiveShadows=0
bDrawLandShadows=0
bDrawShadows=0
fLeafAnimDampenDistEnd=0.0000
fLeafAnimDampenDistStart=0.0000
fMeshLODFadePercentDefault=1.2000
fMeshLODFadeBoundDefault=256.0000
fMeshLODLevel2FadeTreeDistance=0.0000
fMeshLODLevel1FadeTreeDistance=0.0000
iScreenShotIndex=0
bShadowMaskZPrepass=0
bMainZPrepass=0
[Imagespace]
iRadialBlurLevel=0
bDoDepthOfField=0
[LOD]
fLODFadeOutMultActors=4.0000
fLODFadeOutMultItems=1.0000
fLODFadeOutMultObjects=3.0000
fLODFadeOutMultSkyCell=1.0000
[Grass]
fGrassStartFadeDistance=0.0000
b30GrassVS=0
fGrassMaxStartFadeDistance=0.0000
fGrassMinStartFadeDistance=0.0000
[Decals]
bDecals=0
bSkinnedDecals=0
uMaxDecals=0
uMaxSkinDecals=0
uMaxSkinDecalsPerActor=0
[TerrainManager]
fTreeLoadDistance=1.0000
fBlockMaximumDistance=75000.0000
fBlockLevel1Distance=25000.0000
fBlockLevel0Distance=15000.0000
fSplitDistanceMult=0.4000
bShowLODInEditor=0
[BlurShaderHDR]
bDoHighDynamicRange=0
[BlurShader]
bUseBlurShader=0
[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection=1
bShowAllResolutions=1
uLastAspectRatio=3
[Water]
iWaterReflectHeight=256 
iWaterReflectWidth=256
bUseWaterDisplacements=1
bUseWaterRefractions=0
bUseWaterReflections=0
bUseWaterDepth=1
[MAIN]
fSkyCellRefFadeDistance=150000.0000
bGamepadEnable=0
bCrosshairEnabled=1
fHUDOpacity=1.0000
bSaveOnPause=1
bSaveOnTravel=1
bSaveOnWait=1
bSaveOnRest=1
[GamePlay]
bShowFloatingQuestMarkers=1
bShowQuestMarkers=1
iDifficulty=4
[Interface]
bDialogueSubtitles=1
bGeneralSubtitles=1
bShowCompass=1
[Controls]
fMouseHeadingSensitivity=0.0260
fGamepadHeadingSensitivity=1.9000
bAlwaysRunByDefault=1
bInvertYValues=0
bGamePadRumble=0
[Particles]
iMaxDesired=150
[SaveGame]
fAutosaveEveryXMins=15.0000
[AudioMenu]
fAudioMasterVolume=1.0000
fVal7=1.0000
uID7=0
fVal6=1.0000
uID6=0
fVal5=1.0000
uID5=0

uID4=0
fVal3=0.5000
uID3=466532
fVal2=0.8000
uID2=554685
fVal1=0.8000
uID1=1007612
fVal0=1.0000
uID0=94881
[Clouds]
fCloudLevel2Distance=0.0000
fCloudLevel1Distance=0.0000
fCloudLevel0Distance=0.0000
fCloudNearFadeDistance=0.0000
[General]
iStoryManagerLoggingEvent=-1
bEnableStoryManagerLogging=0
[Trees]
bRenderSkinnedTrees=1
uiMaxSkinnedTreesToRender=10




Taken from http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=anId6NaO6is
by AkemiHomura93
author: AkemiHomura93
